preference.name: MEAccountabilityCheckQuickFavorite.PBOP.PlantBOP
preference.preference_description: Defines which Accountability Check Favorite is to be used to run easy update commands for the direction Product BOP to Plant BOP. Value can be of any of the below two forms : a) <uid>:<Favorite name> b) <uid> where uid is the UID of the dataset and Favorite name is the name of the favorite.
